content: अनाथ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] Helpless, poor, forlorn, parentless, orphan (as a child); widowed (as a wife); having no master or natural protector, without a protector in general; नाथवंतस्त्वया लोकास्त्वमनाथा विपत्स्यसे <ls>U. 1. 43</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 12.</ls> --थं <ab>Ved.</ab> Helplessness.
